SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Admin class that provides administrative functionalities such as viewing and updating concert details, viewing bookings, and managing ticket prices.
Booking
Represents a booking for a concert, containing details about the customer, concert, and purchased tickets.
BookingDetails
Manages detailed information about bookings including loading, adding, and retrieving bookings.
Concert
 
ConcertDetails
Manages the details of concerts including loading concert information from data files.
Constants
This class provides a central location for managing all constants used across the Ticket Management System.
Customer
Represents a customer in the booking system.
FileHandler
Handles file operations, specifically reading from and writing to files.
FileLoad
Handles the loading and validation of different types of files related to a booking system, including customer, concert, and booking files.
FileNotFoundException
Custom exception for handling cases where a specified file cannot be found.
IncorrectPasswordException
Custom exception for handling cases where a password does not match the expected password.
InvalidFormatException
Custom exception for handling cases where the format is correct but the content is invalid.
InvalidLineException
Custom exception for handling cases where a line in a file does not conform to the expected format.
loadInfo<T>
Provides an interface for loading information from a file into an object.
NotFoundException
Custom exception for handling cases where a required entity is not found.
Ticket
Represents an individual ticket for a concert, including details about the seat and pricing.
TicketManagementEngine
The main engine for the Ticket Management System.
User
Abstract base class for users of the booking system.
Venue
Represents the venue for a concert with detailed layout and seating arrangements.
